name: Playball (FlameShape)
description:
Football (soccer) simulation, sports game.

CONTROLS

BLUE PLAYER:
-WASD or CONTROLLER_1_LEFT_JOYSTICK to move
-SHIFT or CONTROLLER_1_LT to sprint

RED PLAYER:
-ARROW KEYS or CONTROLLER_2_LEFT_JOYSTICK to move
-RIGHT_CONTROL or CONTROLLER_2_LT to sprint

FULLSCREEN:
-F12 or CONTROLLER_SELECT

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

-GPU: OPENGL 3 Driver
-CPU: x86_64
-RAM: >2GB
-HDD: >100MB
-MONITOR: >1280x720 

Thanks for playing!
